OPCODE:
ADD   - 000000
SUB   - 000001
AND   - 011000
OR    - 011110
XOR   - 010110
"A"   - 011010
NAND  - 010111
NOR   - 010001
XNOR  - 011001
"B"   - 010101
SHL   - 100000
SHR   - 100001
SRA   - 100011
CMPEQ - 110011
CMPLT - 110101
CMPLE - 110111
MUL   - 000010
QUO   - 100010


Test Cases

Case 1: Addition
A = 12345
B = 456
Sum = 12801
z = 0
v = 0
n = 0

Case 2: Addition with Overflow
A = 32767
B = 1
Sum = -32768
z = 0
v = 1
n = 1

Case 3: Subtraction
A = 1
B = 1
Sum = 0
z = 1
v = 0
n = 0

Case 4: Subtraction with Overflow
A = 16384
B = -16385
Sum = -32767
z = 0
v = 1
n = 1

Case 5: AND
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 0000000000000000

Case 6: OR
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 1111111111111111

Case 7: XOR
A = 0100000000000001
B = 1011111111111111
S = 1111111111111110

Case 8: A
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 0100000000000000

Case 9: NAND
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 1111111111111111

Case 10: NOR
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 0000000000000000

Case 11: XNOR
A = 0100000000000001
B = 1011111111111111
S = 0000000000000001

Case 12: B
A = 0100000000000000
B = 1011111111111111
S = 1011111111111111

Case 13: SHL
A = 0100000101001000 (16712)
B = 0000000000000011 (3)
S = 0000101001000000 (2624)

Case 14: SHR
A = 0100000101001000 (16712)
B = 0000000000000011 (3)
S = 0000100000101001 (2089)

Case 15: SRA
A = 1100000101001000 (-16056)
B = 0000000000000110 (6)
S = 1111111100000101 (-251)

Case 16: CMPEQ
A = 6
B = 6
S = 1

Case 17: CMPLT
A = 6
B = 6
S = 0

Case 18: CMPLE
A = 6
B = 6
S = 1

Case 19: MUL
A = -118
B = -120
S = 14160

Case 20: QUO
A = 125
B = 4
S = 31
